resources.string: MetroKontact Internet Services is a Nigerian registered Online Service establishment that facilitates the ease of doing businesses by creating a platform through which individuals.\n in need of any kind of service can reach out to any service provider that provides the exact service they are in need of.\n "MetroKontact’s platform is highly recommended for both service providers and their clients/users."

"1. Promoting businesses and services for service providers."\n
"2. Increases sales/services for service providers who are willing to offer door to door services to clients."\n
"3. At a glance, users can see all the service providers around them on the map." "MetroKontact’splatform enables users to make informed decisions from the wide range of service providers in terms of the services they offer before reaching out to contact them."\n
"4. Our platform gives the users the comfort they deserve in getting their desired service providers easily from the map."\n
"5. Our platform helps to create jobs opportunities."

"1.Download the android application from google play store."

"2.Register and login on www.metrokontact.com."

"3. Add your business."
 "4. Subscribe to activate your account."

"1. Always tell people around you where you are going to meet your client."\n
"2. Have a proper discussion and agreement with your client/service provider before initiating any business contract."\n
"3. Reject the business if the place of meeting is not favorable for you as either a client or a service provider."

"1.Login with your credentials online."\n
"2.Navigate to the Purchase Activation Code Section and follow the instructions."\n
"3.After Successful payment, Login on the app and continue to use our service and find your Activated business on the map."
No location detected. Make sure location is enabled on the device.
Location permission is needed for core functionality
Permission was denied, but is needed for core functionality.

"If you require any more information or have any questions about " "our privacy policy, please feel free to contact us by email at" "info@metrokontact.com. At www.metrokontact.com we consider the " "privacy of our visitors to be extremely important.This privacy policy" "document describes in detail the types of personal information," "collected and recorded by www.metrokontact.com and how we use it.

"
"Log Files.

"
"Like many other web sites, www.metrokontact.com makes use of log files. These " "files merely logs visitors to the site - usually a standard procedure for hosting" "companies and a part of hosting services’ analytics.The information inside the log" "files includes internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, internet service " "provider (ISP),date/time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks." "This information is used to analyze trends, administer the site, track user's movement" "around the site,and gather demographic information. IP addresses, and other such information" "are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable." "Cookies and Web Beacons.
" "www.metrokontact.com does use cookies.

"
"DoubleClick DART Cookie.
"
"Google, as a third party vendor, uses cookies to serve ads on www.metrokontact.com. " "Google's use of the DART cookie enables it to serve ads to our site's visitors based" "upon their visit to www.metrokontact.com and other sites on the internet.Users may opt" "out of the use of the DART cookie by visiting the Google ad and content network privacy " "policy at the following URL - https://www.google.com/privacy ads.html.

"
"Our Advertising Partners.

"
"Third-party ad servers or ad networks that appear on our web site use technology in their " "respective advertisements and links that appear on www.metrokontact.com and which are sent " "directly to your browser. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. Other " " technologies (such as cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons) may also be used by our site's " "third-party ad networks to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or" "to personalize the advertising content that you see on the site.www.metrokontact.com has no" "access to or control over these cookies that are used by third party advertisers.

"
"Third Party Privacy Policies.

"
"You should consult the respective privacy policies of these third-party ad servers for " "more detailed information on their practices as well as for instructions about how to opt-out .
" "of certain practices. www.metrokontact.com's privacy policy does not apply to, " "and we cannot control the activities of, such other advertisers or web sites. You may find a .
" "comprehensive listing of these privacy policies and their links here: Privacy Policy Links. " "If you wish to disable cookies, you may do so through your individual browser options." "More detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers can be " "found at the browsers' respective websites.

"
"Children's Information.

"
"We believe it is important to provide added protection for children online. " "We encourage parents and guardians to spend time online with their children to observe, " "participate in and/or monitor and guide their online activity.www.metrokontact.com does" "not knowingly collect any personally identifiable information from children under the age " "of 13.If a parent or guardian believes that www.metrokontact.com.has in its database the " "personally identifiable information of a child under the age of 13,please contact us " "immediately (using the contact in the first paragraph) and we will use our best efforts" "to promptly remove such information from our records.
"
"Online Privacy Policy Only.
"
"This privacy policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors" "to our website and regarding information shared and/or collected there. This policy " "does not apply to any information collected offline or via channels other than this " "website.
"
"Consent.

"
"By using our website, you hereby consent to our privacy policy and agree to its terms.
"
"Update.

"
"This Privacy Policy was last updated on: Tuesday, September 13th, 2017. Should we update," "amend or make any changes to our privacy policy, those changes will be posted here.
"
